name: Tuytsi You Beige Blazer
description: Tuytsi You Beige Blazer from the SOLAR - SHINE TOGETHER collection, made from premium Tuytsi fabric, soft and shape-retaining. Neutral beige color, easy to mix and match. Fitted design with round neck, long sleeves, and gentle waist cinching that flatters the figure. Suitable for office environment or formal occasions.

name: Kaylin Blazer - Logo Embroidered Blazer
description: The design is part of the "SOLAR - SHINE TOGETHER" collection, presented to fashion enthusiasts as a harmony celebrating the spirit of freedom, optimism, and the radiant beauty of women. It marks the transformation of women in modern times, overcoming the "double" standards imposed on them.

name: Office Croptop Shirt
description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas Collection, deeply imbued with modern style exclusively for women. The minimalist design language is cleverly accentuated with soft stylized details that not only enhance elegant beauty but also express independent personality and sophisticated fashion taste. The Office Croptop Shirt is a perfect combination of youthful, modern style alongside professional elegance. Made from high-quality ribbed silk material, soft, breathable, and shape-retaining. Modern and youthful croptop design, easy to mix with high-waisted pants or skirts. Delicate pleated round neckline, creating an elegant and feminine accent. Long sleeves with neat cuffs, bringing neatness and comfort. Suitable for many occasions such as work, meeting friends, or events.

name: Tencel Silk Blouse with Ruffled Detail
description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas collection, strongly embodying modern style exclusively for women. The minimalist design language is cleverly accentuated with soft decorative details that not only elevate elegant beauty but also express independent personality and sophisticated fashion taste. Tencel silk blouse with ruffled body detail creates a unique and refined appearance, helping to enhance the wearer'spersonal style. - Premium Tencel silk material, soft, breathable, and durable - Stylized ruffle design creates unique, feminine accent - Elegant long sleeves, suitable for various occasions and weather - Modern silhouette, easy to pair with skirts, trousers, or jeans - Perfect for occasions like work, parties, or meeting friends

name: Bloom Collar Shirt
description: The Bloom Collar shirt is a fusion of classic and modern styles, delivering an elegant, subtle yet striking appearance, perfect for office ladies who love creativity in their daily outfits. Made from premium cotton fabric, breathable, helping you feel comfortable throughout the long day. The shirt has a moderate length, maintains good shape and doesn'twrinkle much, ensuring a neat appearance. The stylized collar design creates a fresh, attractive focal point. Elegant three-quarter sleeves are fitting, comfortable, and easy to move in. With its elegant and versatile design, the shirt can be flexibly mixed and matched to create either a professional or youthful, dynamic style.

name: Sophia Elegance Blazer
description: The Sophia Elegance Blazer features a sophisticated fitted silhouette that accentuates body lines, delivering a polished and alluring look. The lapel collar is meticulously tailored, creating timeless elegance. - Made from premium Tuytsi fabric, soft, breathable, and maintains shape well - Sophisticated fitted design highlighting the wearer'selegant silhouette - Sharp, precise stitching offering professionalism and refinement - Easy to pair with various outfits like trousers, skirts, or dresses - Suitable for multiple occasions: office wear, meetings, events, or important gatherings

name: Tweed Collar Silk Shirt
description: Basic shirt design with regular collar, loose fit, long sleeves, and regular length. The shirt comes in two basic colors - white and beige, suitable for various occasions. The shirt uniquely features small pleats at the shoulders and cuffs, bringing a gentle and soft look. The front features silver metal buttons. The collar is combined with Tweed fabric creating an eye-catching block pattern. The shirt uses high-quality silk material that is smooth and light, gently embracing the wearer'sbody.

name: Tweed Otis - Round Neck Wool Coat
description: The Vest design on Tweed wool material brings elegance and attraction that not every fabric can achieve. The rough exterior contains feminine elegance, especially for office ladies. The Otis wool coat features a round neck, regular length, and an easy-to-wear straight silhouette. The coat has fixed buttons on the front body and sleeves. The design includes two small pockets, both creating accents and being able to hold basic items like small wallets, hair clips, or phones. The coat can be mixed with different styles, suitable for pairing with trousers, flared pants, straight pants, and skirts.

name: Savage Loose Blazer
description: The _Savage_ blazer is a fashionable design for girls who love strong and modern style. With a relaxed loose fit, this jacket not only provides comfort but also helps you assert your distinctive, classy fashion taste. The loose fit design comfortably helps conceal imperfections and creates a relaxed look while maintaining elegance. Classic blazer collar design, sharp and formal, easy to combine with many types of inner shirts. Well-fitted long sleeves that can be slightly rolled up for a more dynamic and youthful appearance. _Savage_ uses premium Tuysi fabric, helping to maintain the jacket'sshape perfectly. The fabric surface is smooth, wrinkle-resistant, suitable for office activities or frequent movement.

name: Oversize Piece Suits Blazer
description: Piece Suits participated in the FALL/WINTER fashion show. The blazer is a combination of Office Chic style and premium materials, suitable for ladies pursuing elegance and comfort. Made from soft tweed fabric that is breathable, wrinkle-resistant and maintains good shape.

name: Magnolia Tuytsi Blazer
description: The design is chosen from the YOUTIFUL collection, a harmony between the wearer and their unique beauty. The Magnolia Tuytsi Blazer is a perfect choice for those who love elegant, modern yet luxurious and trendy style. Made from premium Tuytsi fabric that is soft, breathable, and durable. Gentle round neckline creates an elegant, modern look. Relaxed straight silhouette allows easy movement and creates a slim appearance. Above-waist length brings youthfulness and freedom. Easy to mix and match with trousers, jeans, or skirts to create diverse styles.

name: V-neck Silk Shirt
description: V-neck long-sleeve shirt. Sleeve cuffs are designed with elegant pleats. The shirt features subtle embroidered flowers on the chest, delicate and refined. Made from soft silk fabric for wearer comfort. Can be mixed with office trousers, jeans or various types of skirts

name: Lace Crop Top with Styled Collar
description: A design that is both seductive and fashionable, creating a standout appearance for ladies who love feminine yet elegant style. Made from high-quality lace material, the top creates a soft, breathable, and extremely luxurious feel.

name: Dotted Fitted T-shirt
description: Dotted fitted t-shirt made from premium stretch fabric, featuring a body-hugging design that flatters your figure, with unique dot pattern. Suitable for various occasions such as street wear, work, meeting friends or dates.

name: Costliness Blazer
description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas collection, bearing a strong impression of modern style exclusively for women. The Costliness Blazer is a perfect choice for girls who love elegant, modern yet liberating style. Made from premium Tuytsi material that is soft, breathable, and durable.

name: Xuan Yen Ao Dai
description: Feel the spring in the white dress from the Yen Hoa Collection! With soft velvet material and delicately handmade floral details, the Xuan Yen ao dai set is not only a perfect combination of elegant beauty and luxury but also brings comfort and ease to the wearer. Especially, the feminine pink Yen Chau bead detail is the signature that enhances the unique graceful beauty of IVY moda'smuses.

name: Ladies Rayon Gilet Jacket
description: As part of the URBAN CHIC collection launching SPRING/SUMMER 2024 NEW COLLECTION, this design carries the mission of creating flexible transformation in new fashion. To build emotional and mental connections through gentle touch points from soft fabric, well-fitted silhouette and bringing comfortable gentleness. V-neck jacket design with trendy gilet style. The product combines 3 premium material lines of Rayon, Poly, and Spandex, delivering a smooth, comfortable structure, creating a soft feeling when touched. Additionally, the material has natural drape and water-resistant properties, breathable and cool for summer.

name: DIVAS Polo T-shirt
description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas collection, deeply embodying modern style exclusively for women. The minimalist design language is cleverly accentuated with soft stylized details that not only elevate elegant beauty but also express independent personality and sophisticated fashion taste. The classic polo collar is gently modernized, bringing sophistication and elegance, suitable for both daily wear and occasions requiring polished looks.

name: Dreamy Styled Collar Shirt
description: This design is part of the Dreamy Bloom collection, a perfect companion for women, helping them always shine. The product is made from premium materials, soft as if caressing the wearer'sskin. Every detail of the outfit is meticulously crafted, from the elegant silhouette to the feminine patterns, giving confidence in every moment.

name: IVY moda T-shirt
description: The product has a youthful, dynamic but no less trendy style, suitable for all girls who love comfort and personality in their daily style. - Soft, breathable, elastic cotton blend material - Dynamic short sleeve design, easy to mix-match - Modern Ivy Moda text print pattern, sharp and color-fast - Comfortable fit, suitable for many body types - Suitable for many occasions: street walking, work, travel or meeting friends

name: Straight Cut Button-down Collar Shirt
description: The shirt provides comfort while remaining impressive, suitable for various occasions from office to street wear. - Button-down collar design brings elegance and neatness, suitable for both office and casual styles. - Modern zipper detail creates a novel accent and adds convenience when wearing. - Comfortable straight cut helps conceal imperfections, suitable for many body types. - Breathable material, suitable for different weather conditions.
